text: Thanks. Definitely interested in <@UA5DFM7CK>â€™s opinion as well.
<@UDHT6N5SM> hit me up with a DM.  I just got back from a vacation and playing a little (meaning MEGA) catchup in my inbox.  Happy to provide some insight.

Hello everyone, we are having an issue in our theme. We are changing the font to Mulish but the font isn't getting included in the final page, only in the preview. And this was working before for some reason. Do you know what might be causing the issue?

our company has 17 brands. the new themes were great, but a real challenge if you want to share a theme base and modules as we clone landing pages between brands a lot. I created a custom module that loads header, footer and brand style based on the page domain setting.  `{% if content.domain == '<http://yourdomain.com|yourdomain.com>' %} ... {% else %} default {% endif %}` I created a macro for the html markup and css so I just have to pass in variables  like primary and secondary colors in the if statement. DND section backgrounds are still an issue as those have to be set in the page editor.
